name: Limited Jumps (martigpg3)
description:
This is my first game in years , hope you enjoy.

Also if people say I copied Limited Jumps made by Stranger_guy94 , i didnt. I just had a idea for this kinda game(i didnt know there is another game just like mine) . But because he named his game like that first, I will change the name of my game to something you say in the comments(i only will change the name to yours if the name is good).

more levels 

making the ui look better

option's menu
